comment: Dr.joyner was by far my all time favorite math teacher/professor. She is the complete opposite of what your high school teachers try to terrify you of about college professors. She truly cares and enjoys seeing the sucess of her students individually and the class as a whole. She gives plenty of opportunities for extra credit and also allows you to meet with her personally if you have any questions. She takes things step by step and has no problem going back over things. Take her class!!!

I LOVE DR.JOYNER. JUST DONE TAKING HER FOR A 2WEEK MAYMESTER CALC. 1 CLASS AT KENNESAW STATE AND SHE WAS AMAZING! SHE IS VERY HELPFUL, PATIENT, KIND, AND THE BEST MATH TEACHER I'VE EVER HAD! I ACTUALLY LEARNED ALOT IN THE LAST 2WKS. TAKE HER IF YOU CAN!

One of the best teachers I've ever had.  She teaches quickly and can be hard to keep up with and also has pretty hard tests but she gives plenty of opportunities to improve your grade and is extremely helpful outside of class.  She also responds to e-mails quickly and thoroughly.

She is very fair. She gives you plenty of opportunities to improve your grade. Do Online HW helps at end of class, Quizzes are usually problems from the book or very close to them. She doesn't curve tests, and they are pretty hard. Review days offer chance at bonus pts. 8 SI sessions = bonus pts. Though, I found her teaching confusing personally.

Dr. Joyner is probably the most helpful teacher I have ever had. I found her tests very easy. She gives you online homework to do and gives practice tests before the test. All the information that she goes over is very clearly covered. I recommend taking her for this class.

Joyner was extremely helpful. She was more than willing to answer any questions and explained things in a straightforward manner. She assigns homework from the book, which is not graded but is recommended for understanding. She gives partial credit on tests very generously. Very nice teacher.

Professor Joyner's method of teaching is perfect for those who need to see things step by step, though she moves kind of fast. She doesn't like leaving anyone behind though, and is always open to quesitons. Luckily, our class also had an SI. 4 tests, replace lowest with the final. Tests were fairly easy and the review covers material.

Absolutely awesome! She is super helpful, will stay on a subject until the entire class understands. Give a review for all test which are excellent guidelines. Gives extra credit on review day for test. Quizzes are directly from homework.

Dr. Joyner is one of the best professors I've had and will ever have. She is truly every student's dream professor. Her knowledge is incredibly broad and her teaching method is brilliant. She is very polite, understanding, and organized. You won't ever regret having Dr. Joyner as a Math professor because she is one of a kind.

Mrs. Joyner is the easiest math teacher I know. The homework is easy and She tells you what to expect on the tests. She is very helpful when you ask her questions during class. I would reccomend her to anyone.

GREAT teacher. She always gives a review sheet, which is identical to the test. All tests are out of 104 pts. your basically given 4 pnts for error. Class uses Math XL,the book is for personal use(for extra practice). If ur grade is boarderline, then that is when attendence will matter. Lowest grade is replaced with the final grade.No extra credit.
